Room.Name: Lelion Way
Room.ShortDescription: You are walking along Lelion Way, north of Lawrence's Sporting Emporium.
Room.LongDescription: On the north side of the road, you can see Lyanden Lake which flows into the Nylandian Bay. The large lake houses the Lyanden Castle, home to the King of Oceancrest and most of his staff. On the south, you can see Lawrence's Sporting Emporium, where just about anything the average sportsman could want may be obtained.
